info.name: Tumblr - Game of Thrones Sigil buttons
info.description: Replaces your home, inbox, help, settings, and logout buttons with the Stark, Tyrell, Greyjoy, Targaryen, and Tully sigils from Game of Thrones.
info.additionalInfo: Contact me on Tumblr (GeekintheJeep) with any questions/problems/requests. Edited 08/22/15: Updated to work with the new Tumblr update. Please note that the Targaryen sigil will only appear if you have XKit enabled.
